definitions.definition: People who are old; old beings; the older generation , taken as a group.
examples: A civilised society should always look after the old in the community.

definitions.definition: A person older than oneself, especially an adult in relation to a teenager.
examples: I'm not letting an old wreck my good time today.
I'm not letting any olds wreck my good time today.
I had to sneak out to meet my girlfriend and tell the olds I was going to the library.

definitions.definition: A typically dark-coloured lager brewed by the traditional top-fermentation method.

main_definition: ( with the , invariable plural only ) People who are old; old beings; the older generation , taken as a group.
secondary_definitions: ( slang ) A person older than oneself, especially an adult in relation to a teenager.
( slang , most often plural ) One's parents.
( Australia , uncountable ) A typically dark-coloured lager brewed by the traditional top-fermentation method.
